channel.title: Adding play aids for the Gauntlet Drive folder
channel.description:
Hello. I'd like to know how one would go about sending Character Keeper files for the shared Drive folder. I have a pretty good one for Agon in both English and Spanish, and I'd like to add it to the other resources. I have a few others that are less polished or are still works in progress.
Here they are, just in case. English (original): https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1iuQTMHIx75NTwR7w7VOFVxba4ncaxZIHqRv73BVnoqo/edit?usp=sharing Spanish (official translation by The Hills Press): https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1732mZDWdsaM7PRLy4YHA3uCdoiDDdmD9e0k0xEGgZIo/edit?usp=sharing

item.title: Adding play aids for the Gauntlet Drive folder
item.dc:creator: @Gerrit
item.description:
@Gerrit wrote:

Mart√≠n, that‚Äôs great. All added to the Play Aids Archive. Thank you again!

Read full topic

item.title: Adding play aids for the Gauntlet Drive folder
item.dc:creator: @MartinCR
item.description:
@MartinCR wrote:

I‚Äôm glad you liked them. The keepers have a Credits sheet with my info, but I go by Mart√≠n Cer√≥n R., like in my itch profile:
https://martinceronr.itch.io/

By the way, the AGON keeper has a second spanish version with my own translation, that I like more than the official one. I don‚Äôt know if you mind having both up, but here it is:

docs.google.com

Fichero Agon

H√©roe (duplicar para cada personaje) AG√òN EP√çTETO,D6,EP√çTETO 2,üîí Escoge de la lista o crea uno aqu√≠,Requiere un don NOMBRE,D6,DOMINIOS Escoge de la lista o crea uno aqu√≠,üé≠,ARTES & ORATORIA,D6 LINAJE DESCENDIENTE DE,Registra aqu√≠ el linaje de tu...

Once I have some time I‚Äôll work a bit on the others (most of them are still in spanish only), and then I‚Äôll send them your way. Thanks.

item.source: Adding play aids for the Gauntlet Drive folder

item.title: Adding play aids for the Gauntlet Drive folder
item.dc:creator: @Gerrit
item.description:
@Gerrit wrote:

Thank you @flatvurm for tagging me!

Wow, @MartinCR , such nice looking keepers! And a Spanish version! Finally some love for our Spanish keeper section.

I will add those, thank you so much for offering them. Under which name shall I attribute them to you?

About the others: a keeper is better than no keeper, so even when they are less polished they might be good to have. In the end, somebody else might make the effort to beautify them and then it‚Äôs nice to have some collaboration. So feel free to send those to me directly (or post them here).

Read full topic
item.source: Adding play aids for the Gauntlet Drive folder
